org.texgen.textures
Interface Texture

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractTexture, AlphaSignal, Background, Bars, BrickTexture, Camouflage, ChannelSignalTexture, Checker, CloudTexture, ColorFilter, ComplexMarble, Dirty, DirtyBrick, Fireball, Flame, Fur, GradientSignalTexture, GridPattern, HorizontalGradient, ImageTexture, LightTexture, Mandelbrot, Map, Marble, MarbleChessboard, MergedTexture, MultiMergeTexture, NegateTexture, NoisyTexture, Polkadot, RadialGradient, RoundedCornerTexture, SignalMixer, SmoothThreshold, SolidTexture, Squares, SunEclipse, SunsetTexture, TextureGradient, TextureMixer, Threshold, TigerColors, UVColor, UVNoise, UVNoiseTranslate, UVRotate, UVScale, UVSignalRotateTexture, UVSignalTexture, UVTransformer, UVTranslate, VerticalGradient
public interface Texture

Texture interface used to calculate the texture color based on the input u,v values

Author:
Andy Gibson

Method Summary
 RGBAColor getColor(double u, double v)
          Returns the color for co-ordinates u,v as a new RGBAColor object
 void getColor(double u, double v, RGBAColor value)
          Calculates the color for co-ordinates u,v and puts the result in the RGBAColor value object passed in.
 

Method Detail

getColor

RGBAColor getColor(double u,
                   double v)
Returns the color for co-ordinates u,v as a new RGBAColor object

Parameters:
u - U component used to generate the texture
v - V Component used to generate the texture

getColor

void getColor(double u,
              double v,
              RGBAColor value)
Calculates the color for co-ordinates u,v and puts the result in the RGBAColor value object passed in.

Parameters:
u - U component used to generate the texture
v - V Component used to generate the texture
value - RGBAColor object used to receive the result
